text: Belloy-Saint-Léonard (; ) is a commune in the Somme département in Hauts-de- France, which is situated in northern France. ==Geography== The commune is situated on the D157 road, west of Amiens and south of Abbeville. ==Population== ==Personalities== * Philippe Leclerc de Hauteclocque, Marshal of France,paris-France.org born in Belloy-Saint-Léonard, 22 November 1902. ==See also== *Communes of the Somme department ==References== ==External links== * Belloy-Saint-Léonard on the map of France Category:Communes of Somme (department)
title: Belloy-Saint-Léonard
